detaileddescription.para: If defined, MPI is used for parallelization across multiple nodes.

memberdef.name: inter_tol

briefdescription.para: Tolerance for closeness to grid points when interpolating.

memberdef.referencedby: BubbleFunctionCalculator< channel, Q, vertexType_result, vertexType_left, vertexType_right, Bubble_Object >::get_Matsubara_integration_intervals

briefdescription.para: Interpolation method to me used. linear: linear interpolation on the frequency grid. linear_on_aux: linear interpolation on the grid for the auxiliary frequency \Omega. cubic: Interpolation with cubic splines (warning: expensive!).
Tolerance for loop convergence in mfRG.
